lead_paragraph: WILLNER--Arthur, Ph.D, 90, of Port Washington. Died March 27. Director of Psychology at North Shore LI Jewish Hospital for 30 years. He was loved for his humanity, sharp wit and integrity. Survived by his loving wife of 63 years, Selma, his cherished son Jonathan, daughter Toby and granddaughter Arielle. 1/3
